name: Magic Guqin
summary: Magic, miracle and full of imagination… Guqin, a Chinese traditional instrument, brings us the newness with the combination of Chinese ancient culture. Its sweet and agreeable tunes with miraculous eastern appearance will take you to the music journey that you’ve never experienced. Maybe you don’t know music at all, or you have no ideas about eastern culture. It can’t prevent you from experiencing the charming eastern music from Magic Guqin. Even an impromptu can gives you, your family and friends much pleasure. You will definitely fall in love with it! Don’t miss it!!!
